welcome_message_body: Welcome to Didim, Turkey, where ancient history and stunning beaches await you. Explore the charming streets, discover the renowned Temple of Apollo, and bask in the beauty of this coastal gem. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
